name: Mind Your Control - GMTK Game Jam 2020 Submission
name_original: Mind Your Control - GMTK Game Jam 2020 Submission
description:
A or D : Move

F : Focus

Ctrl or C : Explode

R : Reset

Space : Continue

Q : Quit

F11 or H : Help

"Mind control is crucial for success. But sometimes, you have to let go of control and set your mind free." - Me

'Mind your control' by Ava Kim

GMTK GAME JAM 2020 SUBMISSION (48 HRS) 'Out of control' Themed

(p.s. It's very short cus I procrastinated a lot during the jam hehe but enjoy!)
